item.title: Sunday Hackathon 1 -- Subtle Study
item.description: While studying mandarin I found it tedious reading study cards 30+ minutes/day. I browse the internet for 4+ hours a day. Why can’t I learn mandarin while I browse the internet? Now you can! Introducing Subtle Study! Install the plugin Each day, new words will slowly, seamlessly be translated into mandarin. Day 1: All english text. :( Day 2: The word Cat is replaced with mandarin
